result.execSummary:
The defendant Marvin Lanell Spivey was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • 2nd Degree Sexual Assault of Child, a class C felony, Wisconsin Statutes 948.02(2).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
First pay $55.00 to Crime Victim Compensation Program.
Second pay costs, surcharges, assessments, supervision, DNA fees.
ALL to be paid from up to 25% of prison funds.  Balance due prior to the end of Extended Supervision.  Failure to pay shall result in a civil judgment with tax intercept.

superMiscConds.notes: No contact with T.M.A. dob 9/13/2001 and defendant's wife Tamika S.A. without the approval of the Court and/or agent.
AODA assessment with follow up care and treatment.  Absolute sobriety.  Random urine screens.  No positive results.

supervisions.notes:
Defendant required to provide a biological specimen, DNA to the State Crime Lab for testing.
As a convicted felon defendant shall never be in possession of any firearms/body armor/weapons/ammunition at any time in the future.
Defendant cannot vote in any election until civil rights are restored.

Defendant must register as  sex offender. Defendant is prohibited to work at any establishment where children are located under the age of 16.  Not to have unsupervised contact with children under the age of 16.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Marvin Lanell Spivey

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Marvin Lanell Spivey in court with attorney Gary Edward Rosenthal.  Defendant Marvin Lanell Spivey in custody.  Erin M. Karshen appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Statements made as to Sentencing by both counsel and Defendant.    Presentence report reviewed. 

COURT SENTENCED Defendant to a MAXIMUM TERM OF IMPRISONMENT of 20 YEARS, with credit for 188 days time served; the INITIAL TERM OF CONFINEMENT in the Wisconsin State Prison System is 10 YEARS; the MAXIMUM TERM OF EXTENDED SUPERVISION is 10 YEARS.  

The Defendant IS NOT ELIGIBLE for the Challenge Incarceration OR the Wisconsin Substance Abuse Programs.

COURT ORDERED THE FOLLOWING CONDITIONS AS TO THE EXTENDED SUPERVISION:
*  1st pay $55.00 to Crime Victim Compensation Program up to 25% of prison funds with the balance due prior to the end of the Extended Supervision. Failure to pay shall result in a Civil Judgment with tax intercept.
*  2nd pay costs, surcharges, assessments, supervision, DNA fees up to 25% of prison funds with the balance due prior to the end of the Extended Supervision.  Failure to pay shall result in a Civil Judgment with tax intercept.
*  ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY.
*  AODA assessment with follow up care and treatment.
*  Random urine screens with no positive results.
*  No contact with TMA (d.o.b. 09-13-2001); and Defendant's wife Tamika S A without the approval of the Court and or agent.
*  Defendant required to provide a biological specimen (DNA) to the State Crime Lab for testing.
*  As a convicted felon Defendant shall NEVER be in possession of any firearms/body armor/weapons/ammunition at any time in the future.
*  Defendant can't vote in any election until civil rights are restored.
*  Defendant MUST register as a Sex Offender.
*  Defendant is prohibited to work at any establishment where children are located under the age of 16.
*  Defendant is to have no unsupervised contact with children under the age of 16.

Received and filed:
*  Letter/correspondence
*  Employer Verification Form
*  Diagram from Aurora Sinai Medical Center
*  Written Explanation of Determinate Sentence Form
*  Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief Form
*  Pretrial Incarceration Credit Form
*  Ineligible Voting Notice and Acknowledgement Form
*  Letter from Crime Victim Compensation

On motion of the State, Court ordered presentence investigation. Order for presentence investigation filed; copy to Probation Dept.  
Case adjourned to 8-13-2015 at 8:30 a.m .for Sentencing Hearing in Branch 6.
Court advised defendant that as a convicted felon he may not possess any firearms and body armor.
Court advised defendant that he may not vote until civil rights are restored.
Court ordered defendant REMANDED into the custody of the Milwaukee County Sheriff's Department.  
All parties are notified that effective August  3, 2015 this case will be assigned to Judge Ellen Brostrom, Branch 6,  in Room 423 of the Safety Building.  Any right of substitution begins to run as of the date of receipt of this notice, unless notified by the court on an earlier date.

Defendant Marvin Lanell Spivey in court with attorney Gary Edward Rosenthal.  Defendant Marvin Lanell Spivey in custody.  Erin M. Karshen appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Defendant was advised of constitutional rights and maximum penalties, waived all rights, plead GUILTY and was examined as to the plea.  Plea Questionnaire/Waiver of Rights and Addendum received and filed.  Parties stipulate to the complaint as a factual basis for the plea.  Defendant further advised that if he is not a US citizen deportation is possible.  Court found defendant guilty as charged in the Information and ordered entry of Judgment of Conviction.

Attorney Gary Edward Rosenthal in court, defendant Marvin Lanell Spivey not in court, in custody.  Erin M. Karshen appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant's motion to adjourn granted by the court.  Case adjourned for final pretrial in Branch 10.  Final pre-trial scheduled for June 25, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Notice of Expert Testimony filed.  Deputy Court Clerk:  AA.

Attorney Gary Edward Rosenthal in court, defendant Marvin Lanell Spivey not in court, in custody.  Erin M. Karshen appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk:  AA.  Filed, signed Felony Pretrial Scheduling Order.  Case is adjourned for Final Pretrial Conference and Jury Trial scheduled, Branch 10.  Final pre-trial scheduled for May 18, 2015 at 08:30 am.  Jury trial scheduled for June 29, 2015 at 10:00 am.

Defendant Marvin Lanell Spivey in court with attorney Gary Edward Rosenthal.  Defendant Marvin Lanell Spivey in custody.  Erin M. Karshen appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk:  HMP  Deputy Court Clerk:  HMP
  Defendant waived Preliminary Hearing.  Preliminary Hearing Questionnaire and Waiver received and filed. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.   Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Dugan, Branch 10.  Original Information filed.  Copy given to defense counsel who waived reading.  Defendant pled not guilty. Court ordered case adjourned for Scheduling Conference to Branch 10.  Scheduling conference scheduled for March 25, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Court orders defendant TURNED OVER to JUSTICE Point for Supervision.  ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY to be monitored by drug testing and portable breathalyzers.  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.  Defendant advised it is a requirement to attend all future court proceedings.  Failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.
Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with TMA (juvenile) or TSA (adult)

Defendant Marvin Lanell Spivey in court with attorney Alexis Liggins.  Defendant Marvin Lanell Spivey in custody.  Carole Manchester appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk:  bm
  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Dugan, Branch 10.  Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed complaint and found probable cause to hold defendant for further proceedings. DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for March 13, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for Marvin Lanell Spivey
Current: 508 W Maple Street, #2, Milwaukee, WI 53204   (Effective: 03-06-2015)
Prior: 2624 North 45th Street, Milwaukee, WI 53210
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
Arrest Warrant received from the D.A.'s office on filing date of Criminal Complaint.
